description: This file defines a Flask route for a health check endpoint using Flask-Smorest and MethodView. It creates a blueprint with a single GET endpoint that returns a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class implementing a health check endpoint with a GET method.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to perform a simple health check, returning a JSON message indicating health status.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
